item.title: How E-Commerce Companies Are Adapting to AI Search This Holiday Season
item.description: These are the investments businesses are making ahead of the busiest shopping season of the year, according to a new report.

item.title: Goodbye DOGE: The Former Epicenter of Trump and Elon Musk’s Spending War Is No More
item.description: The Department of Government Efficiency ‘doesn’t exist,’ an administration leader said.

item.title: What the Department of Education’s ‘Professional Degree’ Proposal Really Means for Employers
item.description: The DOE’s change to limits on student loans could lead to shortages in some professions as those degrees get harder to afford.

item.title: How the Increase in Daily Commuting Is Affecting Your Business
item.description: New data highlight a major downside of an increase in return to office requirements.

item.title: Why Boomer Business Owners Need to Set Exit Strategies Now
item.description: A majority of older entrepreneurs plan to sell their businesses within five years. Few have made preparations to ensure a smooth transition.
